text: Hi <@UHA0L28CW>, what is your portal id? Also, can you rerun the validation with a `--debug` flag on it and let me know the output from this as well.
Thank you, let me check internally on a few things with this info and I will get back you.
<@UHA0L28CW>, we made a fix on our end. Can you please retry the validation and let me what the outcome is?
<@U7SL518D6> I haven’t been able to see any pattern. It happens at random. One odd thing is it always leaves 2 portals in my config file - my sandbox and 1 other client portal.
Very weird. What's the version number of your CLI? `hs --version`
i tried a fresh config file, but that didn’t solve it
